title: How to get tri color project icon??
body: How to get tri color project icon??

replies.body: I'm not sure what icon you're referring to!  Can you provide me with a screenshot?  All available icons are available in our[ projection disruption ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!
Nope the DISRUPTION Cache/Icon is missing in the guide!

If you mean the DISRUPTION Icon you have to buy the [Disruption Cache](http://cdn.idigitaltimes.com/sites/idigitaltimes.com/files/styles/image_embed/public/2016/08/02/disruption.jpg) at the accessories tab at the shop for 150 RP or 1500  IP.
